event.executesql:
DECLARE @Start DATETIME, @End DATETIME
SET @Start = '12/24/2013 16:00' SET @End = '12/24/2013 20:00'
SELECT TranID INTO #ATMDeposits FROM ATM.dbo.ATMTran at WHERE at.TranType = '21' AND at.TranDate BETWEEN @Start AND @End AND ISNULL(at.ExtendedTransactionType,'6100') != '6110'
UPDATE dbo.PendingTransaction SET ExpireAtUtc = '12/26/2013' WHERE [Source] = 6 AND Sequence IN (SELECT TranID FROM #ATMDeposits)
